resources.string:
This application is written by Jiahua Wu.
 The link for this code is available on https://csil-git1.cs.surrey.sfu.ca/jwa318/cmpt276-a3.git.
 To play the game, click on Play game! button.
 To select the number of rows, columns and mines, go to options.
 The game consist of clicking the buttons until the user finds all the ships.
 Each time the user clicks on a button that has no ship, the number of scan will increase by 1, and it will shows the
 number of ships on that column and row.
 The user can click on a revealed ship to find the
 number of ships on that column and row, but it will increase the number of scans.
